com.quinsoft.zeidon.dbhandler

Interface PessimisticLockingHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DropViewCleanup
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NoOpPessimisticLockingHandler, PessimisticLockingViaDb

    public interface PessimisticLockingHandler
extends DropViewCleanup
    Specifies the interface for locking OIs using pessimistic locking.
    Author:
    DG

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acquireGlobalLock(View view)
      For situations that require it, acquire a global lock that prevents other tasks from performing pessimistic locking on this view.
      boolean acquireOiLocks(View view)
      Acquires the pessimistic locks for a view.
      void acquireRootLocks(View view)
      Acquires the pessimistic locks for a view.
      void dropOutstandingLocks()
      Drops any outstanding locks on OIs specified by the activate options.
      void initialize(ActivateOptions options, Map<EntityDef,QualEntity> qualMap) 
      void releaseGlobalLock(View view)
      Release the global locks needed for this view.
      void releaseLocks(View view)

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(ActivateOptions options,
                Map<EntityDef,QualEntity> qualMap)

      • acquireGlobalLock

        void acquireGlobalLock(View view)
                throws PessimisticLockingException
        For situations that require it, acquire a global lock that prevents other tasks from performing pessimistic locking on this view.
        Parameters:
        view - View to lock
        Throws:
        PessimisticLockingException

      • releaseGlobalLock

        void releaseGlobalLock(View view)
        Release the global locks needed for this view.
        Parameters:
        view -
        Throws:
        PessimisticLockingException

      • acquireRootLocks

        void acquireRootLocks(View view)
               throws PessimisticLockingException
        Acquires the pessimistic locks for a view. This is called after the root entities are loaded but before the rest of the OI.
        Parameters:
        view - View to lock
        Throws:
        PessimisticLockingException

      • acquireOiLocks

        boolean acquireOiLocks(View view)
                throws PessimisticLockingException
        Acquires the pessimistic locks for a view. This is called after the entire OI has been loaded. This call is intended for dbhandlers that can't have more than one open connection at once. This will be called after the connection that loaded the OI has been closed.
        Parameters:
        view - View to lock
        Throws:
        PessimisticLockingException

      • releaseLocks

        void releaseLocks(View view)
        Release the pessimistic locks for this view.
        Parameters:
        view -

      • dropOutstandingLocks

        void dropOutstandingLocks()
        Drops any outstanding locks on OIs specified by the activate options. Intended to be used in situations where the OI no longer exists in memory (like REST servers).
        Parameters:
        activateOptions - Qualification for OIs that will have their locks dropped.
